main.name: Worakamol Boonpriphan
main.description: I'm an Electrical Engineer captivated by Embedded System Development. With six years of experience, I love embracing new tech challenges. Additionally, I'm passionate about software development for eco-friendly solutions. Let's create a greener future together!
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me via my email or LinkedIn

education.description: I had been joined in Committee of the Engineering Faculty's Student Association for the Academic Year 2014. I graduated from Electrical Engineering with first class honors in 2016.
